sentences.en: As a politician Mr Ch á vez is a cool strategist, though a sometimes reckless tactician.
sentences.cn: 身为政治家的查韦斯先生是一位非常冷静的战略家, 尽管有时也是一位不计后果的战术家.

sentences.en: He is an extremely astute political tactician.
sentences.cn: 他是个极其精明的政治谋略家。

sentences.en: He is more of a strategist than of a tactician.
sentences.cn: (他与其说是个战术家,不如说是个战略家. )

sentences.en: His skill in negotiating earned him a reputation as a shrewd tactician.
sentences.cn: 他的谈判技巧使他赢得了精明战略家的名声.

sentences.en: Late last week, Team New Zealand dumped its tactician Hamish Pepper and hired a Frenchman.
sentences.cn: 上周末, 新西兰队撤掉了队里的谋士汉密什?佩珀,另雇了一名法国人取代他.

sentences.en: Master Tactician ( Survival ): Chance to proc increased to 10 %, up from 6 %.
sentences.cn: 战斗大师 ( 生存天赋 ) 现在10%几率触发, 原来是6%.

sentences.en: She is a good enough tactician to wait and see what the election brings.
sentences.cn: 她是个很有谋略的战术家，懂得静观选举的结果。

sentences.en: The skillful tactician may be likened to the shuai - jan.
This will be a decisive test, for many reasons assured the tactician.
sentences.cn: 基于很多原因,这是决定性的测试.

sentences.en: When Juve pick their next tactician, we will all have a clearer idea of the situation.
sentences.cn: 尤文选出他们的新主帅之后, 现在这种处境就会变得清晰明朗起来.

words.tran_cn: 战术的；策略的；善于策略的

trans.tran_en: someone who is very good at  tactics
